name: 48 Hours (Doominator22)
description:
Game made for the first BTK Game Jam. 

Game Jam Simulator.

Push the Buttons to play.

During brother event use ARROW keys.

1.9 Uses Different font custom font. Recommended: 1.8

Windows and Linux edition link : 

https://doominator22.itch.io/48-hours-windows-and-linux-edition

Found a bug where during the tornado you cannot code.

Hint: Push the Minecraft button.

All rights of the Minecraft title and Mumbo Jumbo Video are theirs respectively. If you have a problem with copyright please message me.
